name: n8n-nodes-base.chargebeeTrigger
description: Starts the workflow when Chargebee events occur

options.description: Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)

options.name: Card Added
options.description: Triggered when a card is added for a customer

options.name: Card Deleted
options.description: Triggered when a card is deleted for a customer

options.name: Card Expired
options.description: Triggered when the card for a customer has expired

options.name: Card Expiring
options.description: Triggered when the customer's credit card is expiring soon.Triggered 30 days before the expiry date

options.name: Card Updated
options.description: Triggered when the card is updated for a customer

options.name: Customer Changed
options.description: Triggered when a customer is changed

options.name: Customer Created
options.description: Triggered when a customer is created

options.name: Customer Deleted
options.description: Triggered when a customer is deleted

options.name: Invoice Created
options.description: Event triggered (in the case of metered billing) when a 'Pending' invoice is created that has usage related charges or line items to be added, before being closed. This is triggered only when the Notify for Pending Invoices option is enabled.

options.name: Invoice Deleted
options.description: Event triggered when an invoice is deleted

options.name: Invoice Generated
options.description: Event triggered when a new invoice is generated. In case of metered billing, this event is triggered when a 'Pending' invoice is closed.

options.name: Invoice Updated
options.description: Triggered when the invoices shipping/billing address is updated, if the invoice is voided, or when the amount due is modified due to payments applied/removed

options.name: Payment Failed
options.description: Triggered when attempt to charge customer's credit card fails

options.name: Payment Initiated
options.description: Triggered when a payment is initiated via direct debit

options.name: Payment Refunded
options.description: Triggered when a payment refund is made

options.name: Payment Succeeded
options.description: Triggered when the payment is successfully collected

options.name: Refund Initiated
options.description: Triggered when a refund is initiated via direct debit

options.name: Subscription Activated
options.description: Triggered after the subscription has been moved from 'Trial' to 'Active' state

options.name: Subscription Cancellation Scheduled
options.description: Triggered when subscription is scheduled to cancel at end of current term

options.name: Subscription Cancelled
options.description: Triggered when the subscription is cancelled. If it is cancelled due to non payment or because the card details are not present, the subscription will have the possible reason as 'cancel_reason'.

options.name: Subscription Cancelling
options.description: Triggered 6 days prior to the scheduled cancellation date

options.name: Subscription Changed
options.description: Triggered when the subscription's recurring items are changed

options.name: Subscription Created
options.description: Triggered when a new subscription is created

options.name: Subscription Deleted
options.description: Triggered when a subscription is deleted

options.name: Subscription Reactivated
options.description: Triggered when the subscription is moved from cancelled state to 'Active' or 'Trial' state

options.name: Subscription Renewal Reminder
options.description: Triggered 3 days before each subscription's renewal

options.name: Subscription Renewed
options.description: Triggered when the subscription is renewed from the current term

options.name: Subscription Scheduled Cancellation Removed
options.description: Triggered when scheduled cancellation is removed for the subscription

options.name: Subscription Shipping Address Updated
options.description: Triggered when shipping address is added or updated for a subscription

options.name: Subscription Started
options.description: Triggered when a 'future' subscription gets started

options.name: Subscription Trial Ending
options.description: Triggered 6 days prior to the trial period's end date

options.name: Transaction Created
options.description: Triggered when a transaction is recorded

options.name: Transaction Deleted
options.description: Triggered when a transaction is deleted

options.name: Transaction Updated
options.description: Triggered when a transaction is updated. E.g. (1) When a transaction is removed, (2) or when an excess payment is applied on an invoice, (3) or when amount_capturable gets updated.
